summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6733 for the improvement of The Alleys Adjoining Blocks 17, 18, 23, 24, 26 and 27, Replat of Green Lake Home Addition, Adjoining Portion of Block 25, Replat of Green Lake Home Addition, and Adjoining Portion of Block 1, Weaver's Green Lake Addition; and a certain other portion of alley; and levying and assessing the amounts thereof upon the property within the district; and establishing a local improvement fund.
